name: Elementary My Dear Majesty!
description: Step into a stunning make-believe world in the first 3D hidden object adventure!  The king's daughter has turned into a man-eating monster, and either you find the cure, or it's off with your head!  Put your keen powers of observation to work as you search 14 eye-popping locations for clues, perform tasks for a variety of comical characters, and solve over 100 cunning puzzles.  If you enjoy original and exciting games, Elementary My Dear Majesty is for you!
